name: Gorilla Inu
description: GORILLA INU was created in October 2021 with the goal of being a decentralized meme project with utility and with real world value. GORILLA INUs mission is to bring cryptocurrency concepts to the masses and help with adoption of blockchain services. Unlike other cryptocurrencies GORILLA INU will alocate 1% of the token supply to donate to Gorilla protection organizations around the world. The project has a strong and growing active community following and will be introducing next generation blockchain concepts in the near future (more on that in the roadmap).
